scripts.test: npm run build && php artisan cache:clear
scripts.build: gulp --env=dev cleanup && gulp default --env=dev && gulp --env=dev post_build
scripts.build:p: npm run pre-prod && npm run enable-maintenance && gulp --env=prod cleanup && gulp default --env=prod && gulp license --env=prod && gulp --env=prod post_build && npm run optimize && npm run disable-maintenance
scripts.assets:p: npm run pre-prod && gulp --env=prod cleanup && gulp default --env=prod && gulp license --env=prod && gulp --env=prod post_build
scripts.optimize: php artisan view:clear && php artisan view:cache && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev
scripts.pre-prod: php artisan view:clear && php artisan cache:clear
